mapper.insert: insert into orderList (userName, address, brand, productNumber, count, size) values (#{userName}, #{address}, #{brand}, #{productNumber}, #{count}, #{size})
mapper.update: update orderList set userName=#{userName}, address=#{address}, brand=#{brand}, productNumber=#{productNumber}, count=#{count}, size=#{size} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from orderList order by seq desc
select * from orderList where where brand=#{brand} order by seq desc
